casebody.data:
RADCLIFFE
v.
AVENEL HOMEOWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC., et al. 356P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 H. Clifton Hester, Attorney at Law, Elizabethtown, for Radcliffe, Virginia. James B. Stephenson, II, Attorney at Law, Philip T. Gray, Attorney at Law, Cary, for Avenel Homeowners Association, Inc. Clay A. Collier, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Dinero, Thomas. Donald Ennis, Attorney at Law, for Murray, Stephen, et al. Derek M. Crump, Attorney at Law, John S. Byrd, II, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Reid Russell, Attorney at Law, for Hull, David. Jeffrey H. Blackwell, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, for Zanzarella, Ron. Stacey E. Tally, Attorney at Law, Fayetteville, for Progelhof, Richard.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of October 2016 by Defendant to File Supplemental Response to Petition:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
